techmeme.title: A look at the challenges C.C. Wei faces as he becomes TSMC's chairman on June 4 as part of a management reorg that includes preparing a successor to Wei as CEO (Cheng Ting-Fang/Nikkei Asia)
Sources and filings detail Sam Altman's investment portfolio as he and his venture funds have invested in 400+ companies and his holdings are worth $2.8B+ (Wall Street Journal)
AMD says the 3nm EPYC Turin data center chips will launch in the second half of 2024, based on Zen 5 architecture, featuring up to 192 cores and 384 threads (Paul Alcorn/Tom's Hardware)
AMD announces a yearly data center GPU release cycle, starting with Instinct MI325X, slated for later in 2024 and meant to best Nvidia H200 in peak performance (CRN)
AMD announces two new Ryzen AI 300 series mobile chips, Ryzen AI 9 365 and Ryzen AI 9 HX 370, each with a 50 TOPS NPU, shipping in July (Mark Hachman/PCWorld)
